meanings.sent2: Her dysmenorrhea made it hard to focus at work.
meanings.sent3: The dysmenorrhea was like a monthly battle she had to face.
meanings.sent4: The dysmenorrhea felt like tiny knives stabbing her insides.
meanings.sent5: The dysmenorrhea was a relentless torment that haunted her cycle.

meanings.sent1: The dysmenorrhea was so severe she had to stay in bed.
meanings.sent2: She took painkillers to ease the dysmenorrhea.
meanings.sent3: Her dysmenorrhea felt like a cruel prank played by her body.
meanings.sent4: The dysmenorrhea twisted her abdomen like a writhing snake.
meanings.sent5: The dysmenorrhea was a fiery dragon breathing pain into her belly.
